verses.verse: חֲז֖וֹן <WH2377> The vision עֹֽבַדְיָ֑ה <WH5662> of Obadiah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֨י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <WH3068> from the LORD לֶאֱד֗וֹם <WH123> concerning Edom שְׁמוּעָ֨ה <WH8052> a rumour שָׁמַ֜עְנוּ <WH8085> We have heard מֵאֵ֤ת <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> GOD וְצִיר֙ <WH6735> and an ambassador בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> among the heathen שֻׁלָּ֔ח <WH7971> is sent ק֛וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise וְנָק֥וּמָה <WH6965> ye and let us rise up עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> against לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> against her in battle

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold קָטֹ֛ן <WH6996> thee small נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> Behold I have made בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> among the heathen בָּז֥וּי <WH959> despised אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> You מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> thou art greatly

זְד֤וֹן <WH2087> The pride לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> of thine heart הִשִּׁיאֶ֔ךָ <WH5377> hath deceived שֹׁכְנִ֥י <WH7931> thee thou that dwellest בְחַגְוֵי־ <WH2288> in the clefts סֶּ֖לַע <WH5553> of the rock מְר֣וֹם <WH4791> [is] high שִׁבְתּ֑וֹ <WH7674> cease אֹמֵ֣ר <WH559> that saith בְּלִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> in his heart מִ֥י <WH4310> Who יוֹרִדֵ֖נִי <WH3381> Who shall bring me down אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> common

אִם־ <WH518> Though תַּגְבִּ֣יהַּ <WH1361> Though thou exalt כַּנֶּ֔שֶׁר <WH5404> [thyself] as the eagle וְאִם־ <WH518> Though בֵּ֥ין <WH996> among כּֽוֹכָבִ֖ים <WH3556> among the stars שִׂ֣ים <WH7760> and though thou set קִנֶּ֑ךָ <WH7064> thy nest מִשָּׁ֥ם <WH8033> there אוֹרִֽידְךָ֖ <WH3381> thence will I bring thee down נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

אִם־ <WH518> If גַּנָּבִ֤ים <WH1590> If thieves בָּאֽוּ־ <WH935> came לְךָ֙ אִם־ <WH518> If שׁ֣וֹדְדֵי <WH7703> to thee if robbers לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> by night אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> how נִדְמֵ֔יתָה <WH1820> (how art thou cut off הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> not יִגְנְב֖וּ <WH1589> ) would they not have stolen דַּיָּ֑ם <WH1767> had אִם־ <WH518> If בֹּֽצְרִים֙ <WH1219> gatherers בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> came לָ֔ךְ הֲל֖וֹא <WH3808> not יַשְׁאִ֥ירוּ <WH7604> to thee would they not leave עֹלֵלֽוֹת׃ <WH5955> grapes
אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> how נֶחְפְּשׂ֣וּ <WH2664> searched out עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> How are [the things] of Esau נִבְע֖וּ <WH1158> things sought up מַצְפֻּנָֽיו׃ <WH4710> [how] are his hidden

עַֽד־ <WH5704> forth הַגְּב֣וּל <WH1366> thee [even] to the border שִׁלְּח֗וּךָ <WH7971> have brought כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> All אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> All the men בְרִיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1285> of thy confederacy הִשִּׁיא֛וּךָ <WH5377> with thee have deceived יָכְל֥וּ <WH3201> thee [and] prevailed לְךָ֖ אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> the men שְׁלֹמֶ֑ךָ <WH7965> that were at peace לַחְמְךָ֗ <WH3899> against thee [they that eat] thy bread יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> have laid מָזוֹר֙ <WH4204> a wound תַּחְתֶּ֔יךָ <WH8478> Thahash אֵ֥ין <WH369> else תְּבוּנָ֖ה <WH8394> under thee [there is] none understanding בּֽוֹ׃

הֲל֛וֹא <WH3808> not בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> Shall I not in that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֤י <WH6> even destroy חֲכָמִים֙ <WH2450> the wise מֵֽאֱד֔וֹם <WH123> [men] out of Edom וּתְבוּנָ֖ה <WH8394> and understanding מֵהַ֥ר <WH2022> out of the mount עֵשָֽׂו׃ <WH6215> Esau

וְחַתּ֥וּ <WH2865> shall be dismayed גִבּוֹרֶ֖יךָ <WH1368> And thy mighty תֵּימָ֑ן <WH8487> [men] O Teman לְמַ֧עַן <WH4616> because of יִכָּֽרֶת־ <WH3772> may be cut off אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> to the end that every one מֵהַ֥ר <WH2022> of the mount עֵשָׂ֖ו <WH6215> of Esau מִקָּֽטֶל׃ <WH6993> by slaughter

מֵחֲמַ֛ס <WH2555> For [thy] violence אָחִ֥יךָ <WH251> against thy brother יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob תְּכַסְּךָ֣ <WH3680> shall cover בוּשָׁ֑ה <WH955> shame וְנִכְרַ֖תָּ <WH3772> thee and thou shalt be cut off לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> In the day עֲמָֽדְךָ֣ <WH5975> that thou stoodest מִנֶּ֔גֶד <WH5048> On בְּי֛וֹם <WH3117> on the other side in the day שְׁב֥וֹת <WH7617> carried away captive זָרִ֖ים <WH2114> that the strangers חֵיל֑וֹ <WH2428> his forces וְנָכְרִ֞ים <WH5237> and foreigners בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> entered [שַׁעֲרֹו כ] (שְׁעָרָ֗יו <WH8179> gate ק) וְעַל־ <WH5921> for יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> upon Jerusalem יַדּ֣וּ <WH3032> and cast גוֹרָ֔ל <WH1486> lots גַּם־ <WH1571> again אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you כְּאַחַ֥ד <WH259> even thou [wast] as one מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> do

וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֤רֶא <WH7200> But thou shouldest not have looked בְיוֹם־ <WH3117> on the day אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> of thy brother בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day נָכְר֔וֹ <WH5237> alien וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> neither shouldest thou have rejoiced לִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> over the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day אָבְדָ֑ם <WH6> of their destruction וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תַּגְדֵּ֥ל <WH1431> proudly פִּ֖יךָ <WH6310> neither shouldest thou have spoken בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> of distress

אַל־ <WH408> not תָּב֤וֹא <WH935> Thou shouldest not have entered בְשַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> into the gate עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> of my people בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day אֵידָ֔ם <WH343> of their calamity אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֧רֶא <WH7200> yea thou shouldest not have looked גַם־ <WH1571> Yes אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you בְּרָעָת֖וֹ <WH7451> on their affliction בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day אֵיד֑וֹ <WH343> of their calamity וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁלַ֥חְנָה <WH7971> nor have laid בְחֵיל֖וֹ <WH2428> [hands] on their substance בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day אֵידֽוֹ׃ <WH343> of their calamity

וְאַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> Neither shouldest thou have stood עַל־ <WH5921> at הַפֶּ֔רֶק <WH6563> in the crossway לְהַכְרִ֖ית <WH3772> to cut off אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִיטָ֑יו <WH6412> those of his that did escape וְאַל־ <WH408> not תַּסְגֵּ֥ר <WH5462> neither shouldest thou have delivered up שְׂרִידָ֖יו <WH8300> those of his that did remain בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> of distress

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָר֥וֹב <WH7138> [is] near יוֹם־ <WH3117> For the day יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> upon all the heathen כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> you עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> as thou hast done יֵעָ֣שֶׂה <WH6213> it shall be done לָּ֔ךְ גְּמֻלְךָ֖ <WH1576> unto thee thy reward יָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> shall return בְּרֹאשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH7218> upon thine own head

כִּ֗י <WH3588> Because כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> you שְׁתִיתֶם֙ <WH8354> For as ye have drunk עַל־ <WH5921> and הַ֣ר <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֔י <WH6944> upon my holy יִשְׁתּ֥וּ <WH8354> drink כָֽל־ <WH3605> All הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> [so] shall all the heathen תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> continually וְשָׁת֣וּ <WH8354> yea they shall drink וְלָע֔וּ <WH3886> and they shall swallow down וְהָי֖וּ <WH1961> and become כְּל֥וֹא <WH3808> and they shall be as though they had not הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> existed

וּבְהַ֥ר <WH2022> But upon mount צִיּ֛וֹן <WH6726> Zion תִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will be those פְלֵיטָ֖ה <WH6413> shall be deliverance וְהָ֣יָה <WH1961> become קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> and there shall be holiness וְיָֽרְשׁוּ֙ <WH3423> shall possess בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and the house יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֵ֖ת <WH853> מוֹרָֽשֵׁיהֶם׃ <WH4180> their possessions

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> Then בֵית־ <WH1004> And the house יַעֲקֹ֨ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֵ֜שׁ <WH784> shall be a fire וּבֵ֧ית <WH1004> and the house יוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> of Joseph לֶהָבָ֗ה <WH3852> a flame וּבֵ֤ית <WH1004> and the house עֵשָׂו֙ <WH6215> of Esau לְקַ֔שׁ <WH7179> for stubble וְדָלְק֥וּ <WH1814> and they shall kindle בָהֶ֖ם וַאֲכָל֑וּם <WH398> in them and devour וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will be no יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become שָׂרִיד֙ <WH8300> them and there shall not be [any] remaining לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house עֵשָׂ֔ו <WH6215> of Esau כִּ֥י <WH3588> For יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken

וְיָרְשׁ֨וּ <WH3423> shall possess הַנֶּ֜גֶב <WH5045> And [they of] the south אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣ר <WH2022> the mount עֵשָׂ֗ו <WH6215> of Esau וְהַשְּׁפֵלָה֙ <WH8219> and [they of] the plain אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> the Philistines וְיָרְשׁוּ֙ <WH3423> and they shall possess אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> the fields אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> and the fields שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וּבִנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> and Benjamin אֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> [shall possess] Gilead

וְגָלֻ֣ת <WH1546> And the captivity הַֽחֵל־ <WH2426> of this host הַ֠זֶּה <WH2088> of this לִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> Who כְּנַעֲנִים֙ <WH3669> [shall possess] that of the Canaanites עַד־ <WH5704> far צָ֣רְפַ֔ת <WH6886> [even] unto Zarephath וְגָלֻ֥ת <WH1546> and the captivity יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בִּסְפָרַ֑ד <WH5614> which [is] in Sepharad יִֽרְשׁ֕וּ <WH3423> shall possess אֵ֖ת <WH853> עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> the cities הַנֶּֽגֶב׃ <WH5045> of the south

וְעָל֤וּ <WH5927> shall come up מֽוֹשִׁעִים֙ <WH3467> And saviours בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> on mount צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> Zion לִשְׁפֹּ֖ט <WH8199> to judge אֶת־ <WH853> הַ֣ר <WH2022> the mount עֵשָׂ֑ו <WH6215> of Esau וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> shall be the LORD'S הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <WH4410> and the kingdom
